text: Adelanto is a city in San Bernardino County, California. It is in the Mojave Desert. German, Irish, Italian, English and Scottish are the most common ancestries. Spanish and Tagalog are the most common languages. == References == == Other websites == * City of Adelanto official website Category:1970 establishments in California Category:Cities in California Category:Settlements in San Bernardino County, California
title: Adelanto, California
